author: Simon Difford
description: Vodka's clean neutrality allows the fruity flavours in this summery cocktail to shine. Of the original line-up of seven different Pimm's spirit bases, only No.1 (gin-based) still serves but No.6, which had a vodka base, clung onto life longer than the other five.
name: Vodka Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.6)
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)

recipeInstructions.text: Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish before filling to brim with ice
